subject: Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Dear Beneficiary,
your payment fund have approved to be paid to you so please reconfirmed your bank details information where you want to fund to be credited and let me know if you send anybody to come and represent to you and claim the fund on your behalf,and reconfirm your info to alternative email: 
proofpayment615@gmail.com
Thank God
Mr Mara Baro

subject: Re:   Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Dear Mr. Mara Baro,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the approval of my payment fund. I appreciate your assistance in this matter. However, before I provide you with my bank details, I would like to clarify a few things.

Could you please provide me with more information about the payment fund? What is the source of the funds and why have they been approved for me specifically? Additionally, what is the total amount of the fund that will be credited to my account?

Furthermore, I would like to know more about the process of sending someone to represent me and claim the fund on my behalf. How does that work exactly? Are there any fees or charges associated with this service?

I look forward to your response and thank you again for your help.

Best wishes,
John

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Dear Sir


I receive your email Mr John there is no time to be wasting here since the
inheritance fund payment of $10.5m has been recovered from the hand of the
criminals and available to be paid to you without any delay as soon as you
provide your information where the fund will be credited


Thank you


Mr Mara Baro

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Dear Mr. Mara Baro,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your prompt response regarding the fund payment. However, before I provide any information, could you please clarify a few things for me? I want to make sure that everything is in order.

1. Could you please confirm the source of this fund payment? How was it recovered from the criminals?

2. What is the total amount of the fund that will be credited to me?

3. Are there any fees or charges associated with this transaction? If so, could you please provide details about them?

I look forward to your response and further guidance on how to proceed.

Best wishes,
John

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary,
body:

now you have to be serious to obtain opening file which is 1,500 to obtain

the recovering clarify you on the question you ask regarding the recovering

Mr Mara Baro

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary,
body:
